text:
Belpre is a city in Edwards County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 84 people lived there.
History.
Belpre was created in 1879. It was incorporated in 1906. Belpre's name came from the French word "belle prairie" for "beautiful meadow".
The first post office in Belpre was created in 1879.
Geography.
Belpre is at (37.950976, -99.099597). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
Climate.
Belpre has hot, humid summers and generally mild to cool winters. The Köppen Climate Classification system says that Belpre has a humid subtropical climate, abbreviated "Cfa" on climate maps.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 84 people, 34 households, and 18 families living in Belpre.
2000 census.
The 2000 census says that there were 104 people, 45 households, and 28 families living in Belpre.
